articles.title: Meet the Danish model formerly known as prince - The Times
articles.description: Early this year Scandinavian Vogue featured an unusual male model on its cover, clad in a bold salmon pink jacket: Prince Nikolai of Denmark. It was another coup for the handsome eldest grandson of Queen Margrethe II, Europe’s longest-serving monarch, who has…

articles.title: Allies to help Norway patrol platforms at sea after 'sabotage' - POLITICO Europe

articles.content: Norway’s allies will help patrol the country’s oil and gas platforms at sea after Western countries declared leaks in the Nord Stream gas pipelines a likely act of sabotage, Prime Minister Jonas Gahr… [+1597 chars]
